About Us

All Penguins look Puffy awesome, however some are more rare than others.

A variaty from backgrounds, headwear, clothing and face accessories.

Previews

Roadmap

Puffy Shop

The shop goes online and offer special edition products for Puffy holders + multiple give away products

2.

Buy Backs

With a portion of proceeds, our management team will purchase any unsold Puffy's to keep them for future giveaways and promotions.

4.

FUTURE RELEASE

3D Puffy Penguins

Each Puffy will become a 3D model for the Metaverse integration.

6.

Puffy Staking pool

Setting up a Cardano network node and provide our Puffy holders to earn staking rewards.

8.

LAUNCH

Puffy Penguins Collection

Start Minting any of the 8888 Puffy Penguins on the Cardano Blockchain

1.

Puffy Playhouse

Participate in the Raffle lottery and mini games. Exclusive for Puffy Penguins holders

3.

Launch Celebration

Once we have successfully launched and all the Puffy's have been minted, we will select Five random lucky Puffy holders to receive 1,000 ADA each. Another Ten random lucky Puffy holders will receive various products from the Puffy Merch shop.

5.

Puffy Metaverse

We will collaborate with one of the metaverse projects to build a Puffy Club House, where all Puffy Penguins can come together.

7.

Real world utility

The Puffy Members have access to exclusive events, puffy Merch shop, Staking pool, Metaverse and more! We are continually focusing on the future to keep providing real value for our holders and to the Cardano NFT space.

9.

Faq

Mint Date, Price & Supply

Mint Date: July 17 Sunday 2022 4pm UTC
Mint Price: 40 ADA
NFT Supply: 8,888

Will there be rarity ranks ?

The rarity will be revealed on cnft.tools

What's the Puffy Penguins policy ID ?

Сoming soon

Whitelist Information

There are only 1400 spots for the whitelist - Enter our discord server to check how to get whitelisted.

What crypto wallets can I use ?

Shelley-era wallets like Yoroi/Daedalus/Nami/CCVault wallets/Eternl Do not send from an Exchange!

Is there any benefits to holding a Puffy Penguin ?

A Puffy Penguin NFT is your ticket into an exclusive network of NFT enthusiasts and an eventual access to the Puffy playhouse, Puffy shop and multiple giveaways

If i send ADA after the project has sold out do i get my ADA back?

Yes, all refunds will be given out after the end of the minting process.

More Questions ?

If you have any more Questions feel free to submit a Support Ticker in our Discord server.
